title: Low VOC's & Low EMF's    Apt for rent
posting_body: 95% of the people who see this ad's title don't know what it means.
But YOU Do.
Do you have chemical sensitivities or sensitivities to EMF's?
Do you need a place to live with Low Volatile Organic Compounds (VOC's) and /or Low Electro Magnetic Frequencies (EMF's).
This house was built in the 1950's before toxic materials were commonly used in construction.
This Healthier Living Environment has low EMF and low VOC's (Electromagnetic Frequencies and Volatile Organic Compounds.
This may be the place you have been looking for.
(See testimonial below.)
It is a mother-in law-apartment or a private apartment that is inside of a nice residential dwelling in a quiet residential neighborhood.
The apartment has three rooms: a bedroom, a bathroom and a kitchen.
There is plenty of storage with a closet and extra storage in each room.
There is access to a washer and dryer and extra storage in the basement.
There is free parking right in front of the house.
The bedroom and kitchen have hardwood oak floors and hand textured plaster walls and ceiling.
The floor, shower / tub enclosure and the walls are ceramic tile below and plaster above.
The bathroom has a granite counter, an oak cabinet and an extra storage closet.
The kitchen has maple and oak cabinets and shelves.
There is a refrigerator and four burner stove and oven.
There is a microwave but it can be removed if you don't want to use it.
Hot water heating is provided by a boiler and baseboard radiators.
There is central air conditioning and a swamp cooler available for lower cost cooling.
Organic Gardening space is also available for growing healthy food.
The apartment is located in the 49th and Sheridan area.
Grocery stores, restaurants, and lots of other shopping are conveniently nearby.
There are extensive hiking and biking trails nearby, a public golf course, a Denver Recreation Center, tennis courts, and a private fitness center.
Interstate 70, I 76 and I 25 are all nearby and easy to get to.
It's close to public transportation.
There are three bus routes nearby and a light rail line is a short drive or Uber ride away.
Testimonial:
I was living recently in an older Mobile Home Park where the homes were sited very close together.
I am sensitive to EMF (Electro-Magnetic Frequencies).
EMF can cause me a lot of discomfort and even make it hard for me to sleep when it is at high levels.
Everyone nearby me had a WiFi emitting Internet connection system running 24 hours per day which led to a lot of EMF.
Then, the Park added 5G wireless service with a high-emitting 5G antenna nearby.
The 24 hour emissions of EMF became very uncomfortable.
I needed some relief from it and stayed at my friend Jeff’s place for a number of days.
I can attest from my personal experience that his place has low EMF and gave me some much needed relief.
Char H.
For more details and to receive a link to view a video of the apartment please reply and I will send it to you promptly.
Thank you.
